description:
A full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon with deep structure. It opens with aromas of black cherry and cedar, followed by a velvety finish of toasted oak.

Best paired with: Our signature Double Cheeseburger or the rich, slow-cooked Lasagna.

A sophisticated Provence-style Ros√©. This wine is delightfully crisp, offering a bouquet of wild strawberries and rose petals with a clean, mineral finish.

Best paired with: The Pizza Margherita or our herb-marinated Chicken Burger.

A vibrant Sauvignon Blanc with bright acidity. Expect a refreshing palate of zesty lime, green apple, and a hint of tropical passionfruit.

Best paired with: Spaghetti with Shrimps or the vibrant flavors of the Vegan Burger.

The pinnacle of celebration. An exquisite Brut Champagne featuring fine bubbles and complex notes of toasted brioche, white flowers, and citrus zest.

Best paired with: Profiterols for a decadent dessert experience or enjoyed as a refined aperitif.
